replies.bodyText: I started down this road but it turns put that the mapping in JiraClientImpl.searializeBasicIssue is non-trivial.  I would have to define half a dozen new POJOs to get ObjectMapper to do the right thing.  So I don't think the elegance of ObjectMapper is worth the effort.
